news_items.title: Philippine Government Announces New Infrastructure Plan
news_items.summary: The national government unveiled a ₱500 billion infrastructure initiative focusing on rural development and transportation upgrades.

news_items.title: Typhoon Karding Approaches Northern Philippines
news_items.summary: Authorities issue alerts as Typhoon Karding brings heavy rains and possible flooding to Luzon regions.

news_items.title: Manila Hosts ASEAN Business Summit 2024
news_items.summary: Leaders gather to discuss economic cooperation and digital innovation during the annual ASEAN Business Summit in Metro Manila.
